ai-mil5.4.3:1.1_0: “Venerable Sir, the Buddha has said these words:
ai-mil5.4.3:1.2_0: he is expelled in the community.
ai-mil5.4.3:1.4_0: he commits an offense for which there is a serious offense.
ai-mil5.4.3:1.5_0: But sir, a bull elephant who lies down embracing a person in a solid food, pertaining to falsehood, and getting upset.
ai-mil5.4.3:1.6_0: the Buddha has said these words:
ai-mil5.4.3:1.7_0: ‘With full awareness’, (thinking): ‘He is expelled in the presence of the Teacher,’ he commits a serious offense.
ai-mil5.4.3:1.8_0: whatever was said by the Realized One,
ai-mil5.4.3:1.9_0: ‘You have committed an offense entailing expulsion.’
ai-mil5.4.3:1.10_0: this question too should be expelled by a each question.”
ai-mil5.4.3:2.1_0: “Great king, the Buddha has spoken about this:
ai-mil5.4.3:2.2_0: he is expelled in the community.
ai-mil5.4.3:2.4_0: ‘Knowing in the presence of one unconfined offense, he commits a serious offense. And one of the following offenses, he commits an offense entailing confession.’
ai-mil5.4.3:2.5_0: What do you think, great king, that person would give you staff with his fist.”
ai-mil5.4.3:2.7_0: ‘I am not blemish’, what we do.”
ai-mil5.4.3:2.8_0: “While that person was to give you a staff with your fists, then what would that person?”
ai-mil5.4.3:2.9_0: “Sir, I’d cut my legs with a skull as long as I’d have been cut off at the feet and wait within seven palm trees.”
ai-mil5.4.3:2.10_0: “But great king, what is the place whereby an ends of all hands, a footprint, square, and arrowshave with the hands, a footprint, or a ramparts, and all the grass?”
ai-mil5.4.3:2.12_0: “In the same way, great king, is a heavy offense for lying in full awareness.”
ai-mil5.4.3:2.13_0: “Good, sir, would you agree with such a dragon?”
